entry.def: Topside is a joint of beef that is cut from the upper part of the cow's leg. It is usually cooked by roasting or stewing.
On a ship, if you go topside, you go up onto the top deck.

example.ex: He left the control station and went topside.
example.tran: 他离开控制台，走到甲板上。

entry.tran: (船体的)主甲板以上部分，水线以上部分
entry.def: The topside or topsides of a ship or boat are the top deck or the parts which you can see above the water.

means.word_mean: 1. (usually plural) weather deck; the part of a ship's hull that is above the waterline
